info.title: Information
info.step1: Connect Wallet: Connect your Solana wallet.
info.step2: Hold Tokens: Ensure you have enough HOOPX tokens (10,000 per ticket).
info.step3: Redeem Ticket: Click the "Redeem Ticket" button and confirm.
info.step4: Token Burn: Once confirmed, tokens will be burned, and tickets will be added to your account.
info.step5: Submit Prediction: Enter your predicted scores on each ticket and submit.
info.step6: Deadline Notice: Predictions will be strictly closed once the betting countdown ends. No modifications or submissions will be allowed thereafter.
info.mainPrizeDetails: Winning Criteria: The participant with the smallest Total Deviation.
info.mainPrizeFormula: Formula: Total Deviation = |Home actual − Home predicted| + |Away actual − Away predicted|
info.luckyPrize: Lucky Number Jackpot: 100 random winners get 10 USDT each.
info.prizeLadderDesc: The prize pool automatically upgrades as more tickets are issued:
info.rule1: Prediction Target: Predict the cumulative HOME vs AWAY scores for all NBA games on Dec 19-26 (UTC+0).
info.rule2: Score Range: Each prediction must be between 0 - 1000 for each team.
info.rule3: Multiple Entries: Multiple tickets allowed; however, each ticket must have a unique prediction.
info.rule4: Tie-Breaker: In case of a tie in Total Score Difference, the prize will be split equally among the winners.
info.term1: Data Source: Results are based on official NBA statistics. If official corrections occur within 24 hours post-game, the updated data will be used for final settlement.
info.term2: Irreversibility: Once tokens are burned to redeem tickets, the process is irreversible. No withdrawals or refunds.
info.term3: Anti-Cheat: Any use of technical exploits or system vulnerabilities is strictly prohibited. The official team reserves the right to disqualify violators.
info.term4: Prize Distribution: Rewards will be automatically distributed to winners' Solana wallets within 72 hours after the event concludes.
